articles.description: The allrounder picked up an ankle injury during Australia's first training session in Durban
articles.content: Matthew Wade is back in the Australia T20I squad  •  BCCI

articles.author: Aditya Suketu Desai
articles.title: "If we can't score 300 against this team, can we do that when we face India?" - Kamran Akmal on Pakistan's batting in ODI series vs Afghanistan - Sportskeeda
articles.description: Former Pakistan keeper-batter Kamran Akmal was left disappointed by the Men in Green's failure to dominate Afghanistan bowlers in the recently concluded three-match series between the two nations.
articles.content:
Former Pakistan keeper-batter Kamran Akmal was left disappointed by the Men in Green's failure to dominate Afghanistan bowlers in the recently concluded three-match series between the two nations.
